EmailTemplate.name: Uniform Shop Krylatskaya Temporarily Closed
EmailTemplate.subject: Uniform Shop Krylatskaya Temporarily Closed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group
Dear Parents,
Please note that the uniform shop in Krylatskoe campus will be closed from Thursday, 1pm until Wednesday morning due to new stock arrival and stock update. We will reopen on Wednesday, September 03, at 8am. Please accept our apologies for the inconvenience.
Regards,
Admissions Team The International School of Moscow World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Member of The British School Group- University of Cambridge Examination Centre - Affiliate Member of the Conference of British International Schools - Licensed by the Russian Ministry of Education
